com.stachera.justyna.cognifide.dao

Interface SBLibraryDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SBLibraryImpl

    public interface SBLibraryDao

    LIBRARY DAO INTERFACE

    Interface includes method declarations to manage JSON files which contain book data.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Justyna Stachera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getBookAll(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
      The method is used to get all books as JSONObject.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getBookByIsbn(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject, java.lang.String isbn)
      The method is used to get book as JSONObject by ISBN number.
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getBookByRatingDesc(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
      The method is used to get book list as JSONArray by average rating in descent order.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBookCategories(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
      The method is used to get all book categories as List.
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getBooksByCategory(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject, java.lang.String categoryName)
      The method is used to get book list as JSONArray by category name.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getJSONData()
      The method is used to load JSON file due to 'param' command line parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • getJSONData

        org.json.simple.JSONObject getJSONData()
        The method is used to load JSON file due to 'param' command line parameter. It contains a file path. Before running the command line should include the argument: -Dparam which contains the file path. Otherwise SBJsonFormatFileNotFoundException will occur.
        Returns:
        JSON file converted to JSONObject.

      • getBookAll

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getBookAll(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
        The method is used to get all books as JSONObject. Before calling the method we have to invoke getJSONData() from SBLibraryDao. In case of not found 'items' field in JSON file SBItemsFieldNotFoundException will occur.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSON file converted to JSONObject.
        Returns:
        This returns JSONArray which contains all books.

      • getBookByIsbn

        org.json.simple.JSONObject getBookByIsbn(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                         java.lang.String isbn)
        The method is used to get book as JSONObject by ISBN number. Before calling the method we have to invoke getJSONData(). In case of not found ISBN number in JSON file SBIsbnNotFoundException will occur.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSON file converted to JSONObject.
        isbn - Looking for ISBN number.
        Returns:
        This returns JSONObject which contains all books by ISBN number.

      • getBooksByCategory

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getBooksByCategory(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                             java.lang.String categoryName)
        The method is used to get book list as JSONArray by category name. Before calling the method we have to invoke getJSONData(). In case of not found category name in JSON file SBCategoryNameNotFoundException will occur.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSON file converted to JSONObject.
        categoryName - Looking for category name.
        Returns:
        This returns JSONArray which contains all books by category name.

      • getBookByRatingDesc

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getBookByRatingDesc(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
        The method is used to get book list as JSONArray by average rating in descent order. Before calling the method we have to call getJSONData(). In case of not found 'items' field in JSON file SBItemsFieldNotFoundException will occur.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSON file converted to JSONObject.
        Returns:
        This returns JSONObject which contains all books .

      • getBookCategories

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBookCategories(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
        The method is used to get all book categories as List.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JSON file converted to JSONObject.
        Returns:
        This returns List which contains all book categories.
